name: getAccessRules
description: This API returns an array of access rules associated with the rolls of the caller. A DSS access rule permits members of a role to create DSS subscriptions associated with an oem model, device property, client type, and subscription type.

name: createAccessRule
description: This API creates an access rule.

name: getAccessRule
description: This API returns the specified access rule.

name: deleteAccessRule
description: This API deletes the specified access rule.

name: getSubscriptions
description: This API returns an array of subscriptions each associated with a corresponding access rule.

name: createSubscription
description: This API creates a subscription associated with a corresponding access rule.

name: getSubscription
description: This API returns a subscription associated with a corresponding access rule.

name: deleteSubscription
description: This API deletes the specified subscription.

name: getContacts
description: This API returns an array of all contacts associated with the caller.

name: createContact
description: This API creates a contact.

name: getContact
description: This API returns details about a contact.

name: updateContact
description: This API updates details for the contact.
request_description: The request data should include only the contactId and the fields to modify.

name: deleteContact
description: This API deletes a contact.

name: getShares
description: This API returns an array of resources (e.g. devices, groups) shared by the caller.

name: getReceivedShares
description: This API returns an array of resources shared with the user.

name: getDevices
description: This API returns an array of devices registered to, or shared with, the caller. The key value in the Response Body is the unique device id, so use this value in calls to other operations that require a device id parameter.

name: getDeviceByDevId
description: This API returns the specified device.

name: updateDeviceLocation
description: This API updates device location.

name: getPropertiesByDevId
description: This API returns an array of properties for the specified device.

name: getPropertyByDevId
description: This API returns a property for the specified device.

name: createDatapointByDevId
description: This API creates a datapoint for the specified property. The metadata in the request data is optional.

name: getSchedules
description: This API returns an array of schedules for the specified device.

name: createSchedule
description: This API creates a schedule.

name: updateSchedule
description: This API updates a schedule.

name: getScheduleByName
description: This API returns a schedule by name of the specified device.

name: getDeviceByDsn
description: This API returns the specified device.

name: renameDeviceByDsn
description: This API renames a device.

name: getDeviceMetadata
description: This API returns metadata associated with the specified device.

name: createDeviceMetadatum
description: This API creates metadata for the specified device.

name: getDeviceMetadatum
description: This API returns a single metadatum for the specified device.

name: updateDeviceMetadatum
description: This API updates a single metadatum for the specified device.

name: deleteDeviceMetadatum
description: This API deletes a single metadatum for the specified device.

name: getGroups
description: This API returns an array of device groups.

name: createGroup
description: This API creates a device group.

name: getGroup
description: This API returns the specified group.

name: renameGroup
description: This API renames the specified group.

name: deleteGroup
description: This API deletes the specified group.

name: addDeviceToGroup
description: This API adds a device to a group.

name: removeDeviceFromGroup
description: This API removes a device from a group.

name: getScheduleAction
description: This API returns a schedule action.

name: updateScheduleAction
description: This API updates a schedule action.

name: deleteScheduleAction
description: This API deletes a schedule action.

name: getSchedule
description: This API returns the specified schedule.

name: clearSchedule
description: This API clears a schedule.

name: createScheduleAction
description: This API creates a schedule action.

name: getScheduleActions
description: This API returns an array of schedule actions.

name: getScheduleAction
description: This API returns a schedule action.

name: getSchedulesForUser
description: This API returns schedules accessible by user.

name: getUserByUuid
description: This API returns information about the specified user.

name: getUserProfile
description: This API returns information about the caller\'s user profile.

name: getTokens
description: This API returns an access token and a refresh token.

name: returnTokens
description: This API expires the access tokens.
